pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Waterfall Chart in Python---The waterfall_ax library creates flexible waterfall charts based on matplotlib. It provides flexible controls over your plot. For details please refer to the [waterfall_ax repo](https://github.com/microsoft/waterfall_ax).## A Simple ExampleSample code:```from waterfall_ax import WaterfallChart# Cumulative valuesstep_values = [80, 70, 90, 85, 60, 50]# Plotwaterfall = WaterfallChart(step_values)wf_ax = waterfall.plot_waterfall(title='A Simple Example')```
